title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag Monday, Seahawks OC Brian Schottenheimer on Russell Wilson's 'chip', Pete Carroll's enthusiasm
description:
Monday means mailbag time. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough answer your 5-star questions left on Apple Podcasts (4:00). Do we underrate Bill O'Brien as a head coach? Is there a scenario that Josh Rosen provides value to the Dolphins? How do the guys view the Jets offseason? All that is covered in the first half of the episode. Then, Will welcomes Seahawks offensive coordinator Brian Schottenheimer (37:15) to discuss Seattle's continuity, the relationship between Pete Carroll and Russell Wilson, respect for Russ around the league, his experience coaching some elite quarterbacks and more!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
